name: Alien Attack (dan.wiltshire)
description:
Story:

In deep space a company funded research spaceship has just left an abandoned research station with the last of its scientific equipment and is heading back home. However, a symbiotic like alien has joined the crew. It is up to the crew to find out who the alien has taken as its host before they return home. In the day, the crew must deduct who the alien is before they must go into cryosleep where the alien can strike each night.

Game Info:

The card game is a social, role based, deduction game ideal for big groups of friends to partake in. Role playing is advised but not a necessity.
